Instance Method# createDocument

TVMLKit JSWebKit JStvOS 13.0+Safari Desktop 10.0+Safari Mobile 10.0+**tvOS**

    in String namespaceURL, 
    in String qualifiedName
);

**Safari Desktop, Safari Mobile**



```
XMLDocument createDocument(
    DOMString? namespaceURI, 
    DOMString qualifiedName, 
    optional DocumentType? doctype
);
```
